LanguageData.MakeStickBomb.label: make stick bombs
LanguageData.MakeMolotov.label: make Molotov Cocktails
LanguageData.MakeMolotov.description: Make a thrown weapon that burns your enemies into ashes!
LanguageData.MakeFragGrenades.label: make frag grenades
LanguageData.MakeFirefoamGrenade.label: make firefoam grenades
LanguageData.MakeFlashbangGrenades.label: make shock grenades
LanguageData.MakeFlashbangGrenades.description: Builds a set of Shock Grenades. Shock grenades are damaging to electronic equipment or electronic-based entities. They do not harm non-electronic entities. Shock Grenades are thrown by hand and have a 3x3 blast zone around the point of impact.
LanguageData.MakeIncendiaryGrenade.label: make incendiary grenades
LanguageData.MakeIncendiaryGrenade.description: A condensed mix of plasma materials make for a small but chaos inducing explosion.
LanguageData.MakeSmokeGrenade.label: make smoke grenades
LanguageData.MakeHighExplosiveGrenades.label: make high explosive grenades
LanguageData.MakeEMPGrenades.label: make EMP grenades
LanguageData.MakeEMPGrenades.description: Builds a set of EMP Grenades. Electro-Magnetic Pulse Grenades are extremely damaging to electronic equipment. These grenades are thrown by hand and have a 3 tile radius from the point of impact.
LanguageData.MakeFusionGrenades.label: make fusion grenades
LanguageData.MakeFusionGrenades.description: An improvement over the simple frag grenade, contains a more potent explosive.
LanguageData.MakePlasmaGrenades.label: make plasma grenades
LanguageData.MakePlasmaGrenades.description: A very potent mix of plasma particles make for a small but deadly explosion.
